name: BRIDGE Housing
description: Bridge Housing is a Bay Area nonprofit housing developer serving low- to moderate-income families and seniors. Their goal is to set the standard for affordable housing. Mission: BRIDGE Housing strengthens communities and improves the lives of its residents, beginning—but not ending—with affordable housing.
